text.title: part5_BDSM as business: An interview with the owners of a dungeon

p.hi: DS: Sure.

p: Bill: --but I have a chart that I'll go through; the MMPI. The baseline data that I use to--

p.hi: DS: How did you originate these questions?

p: Bill: Where did I make them? You get a baseline from asking girls and refining profiles--

p.hi: DS: And it's an amalgamation of questions.

p: Rebecca: What's your favorite question? I don't know, the O.J. Simpson . . . .

p.hi: DS: Yeah, I see O.J. Simpson. What would that be an indicator of?

p: Bill: I'm not sure which one you gave him, but there's a brief, brief, brief IQ test there. Very brief.

p.hi: DS: Do you ask for references?

p: Bill: No, because I really can't call and tell them I'm [laughs] yeah, so-and-so's applying here for a position.
head: The prices

p.hi: DS: What does it typically cost for a session?

p: Bill: In the two hundred dollar range.

p.hi: DS: And there's lower, and there's higher?
DS: Depending on what they want to do?

p: Bill: Exactly. A little lower. Mostly higher.

p.hi: DS: What would be the most expensive thing that someone would ask for?
DS: Multi-girl? And what would they do in that?

p: Bill: What did you charge the one guy? Eight hundred dollars an hour for--

p.hi: DS: Three girls would be eight hundred dollars an hour?
DS: And does it vary based upon what they're asking for?
DS: What would be an expensive, and what would be a cheap thing?

p: Rebecca: It just varies, there's so much--I mean, tickling can be $210 for the hour--
Bill: --as we go up, so whatever you put in Wikipedia--

p.hi: DS: Sure.

p: Bill: By next year, it's gonna be all new. But probably say for your article, it's two plus--

p.hi: DS: And for an expensive thing? What would be something that's--

p: Bill: It can go up to a thousand, two thousand, we've had--

p.hi: DS: What kind of an experience would that be that someone asks--?
DS: But what would they do--multi-girls, just . . . . Like some--

p: Bill: The skyâ€™s the guy. There's no intercourse, there's no--

p.hi: DS: Intercourse is completely off.
DS: What about orgasms?
DS: They're allowed orgasms.
DS: And that's typical?

head: The clients

p.hi: DS: What are your clients like?

p: Bill: We cater to a human being first. If you came in here, and you were a client and had to use the bathroom, before you gave me dollar one--
